message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I can meet you in the middle at $110. This is the best price I can offer for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $95 for the product?
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $105. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $100 for the product?
